title: G
data:
==Commands==
*Pressing the '''g''' key while standing over an item will cause you to pick it up. If there are multiple items on the tile, it will go through them one by one, asking if you'd like to pick up each, or you can access a menu of all available items instead.
*Pressing '''G''' brings up the autotravel menu. From here, you can select to go up or down a floor by the shortest means possible (press '''<''' for up and '''>''' for down), or to any branch that you've already discovered.

==Symbols==
While playing in console mode:
*'''g''' represents a [[goblin]] or [[Gnoll_(monster)|gnoll]]-type monster.
*'''G''' represents an [[List of eyeballs|eyeball]]-type monster, or an [[ophan]].
